channel.title: Hyperion animations
channel.description:
Hey, how to set correct animations in Hyperion base ?
animations should depend on Fight Style (Slash, Stab, Block etc.) and on weapon (Dager, 2h, Scimitar etc.). Same with attacking timers (ticks).
Also where can I get correct animation numbers for attacking/blocking...
